Title: Nightmare on Ocean Avenue Street
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Dan Fybel
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, Larry Murphy
Plot: The Belcher kids set out to find the culprit who's snatching everyone's candy bags on Halloween night. Meanwhile, Teddy gets carried away when he decorates the restaurant to compete with another handyman on the street.
